Puli, town in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan

sentences.english: The three injured workers are being treated at the Puli Christian Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 三名受伤的工人送往埔里基督教医院治疗。

sentences.english: Puli cannot avoid the changes brought by modern construction.
sentences.chinese: 埔里也难避免现代建设带来的变貌。

sentences.english: When is the next bus to Puli ?
sentences.chinese: 下班去埔里的公车什么时候来？
